author: Special Correspondent
text:
Members of the Joint Action Council of Tamil Nadu Teachers’ Organisation (JACTTO) staged a human chain agitation here on Saturday, pressing for their 15-point charter of demands, including scrapping of the new pension scheme and removal of the anomalies in the Sixth Pay Commission.

JACTTO district coordinator V. Ramamurthy, who led the agitation along with district office-bearers of various Teachers’ Associations, said the stir was part of the State-wide agitation launched by the action council to draw the government attention. About 700 members, including a large number of women, joined hands from Union office to New bus stand. JACTTO would organise a massive agitation in Chennai on February 25, Mr. Ramamurthy said.
title: Human chain formed
